name: The Butter Flying effect
description:
The butterfly effect is an example of chaos theory, the flap of the wings of a butterfly can cause a tornado, of course, a butterfly is just a piece of butter that flies (Butter flying).

In "The Butter Flying Effect" you can cause tornados and fly to beat your enemy, who is a literal fly.

-Creators-

Art and music by Toads Sugar (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw9rBWMqomMTaVikjj_aSEQ)

Code by QuantumMeme (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWzHMgXB2lNED6OFySYqNAA)
